body:
In politics, people throw around the word ‘friend’ so much it often has little real meaning. This is not one of those times. When I call Jeb Bush my friend, I mean he is someone I like, care for and respect.”

— Senator Marco Rubio of Florida sent out a statement welcoming former Gov. Jeb Bush, who will announce his candidacy Monday, to the presidential race.
description: Senator Marco Rubio sent out a statement welcoming former Gov. Jeb Bush, who will announce his candidacy on Monday, to the presidential race.
title: First Draft: Verbatim: Marco Rubio Salutes His Florida ‘Friend’ Jeb Bush
